query: SELECT instagramGrowth FROM roadmaps WHERE id = 270002;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 33SnFdKKKChXdDb.57e91fc65cf3 --database VpwDNTczi26yJvvzQBaFT4 --execute SELECT instagramGrowth FROM roadmaps WHERE id = 270002;

rows.instagramGrowth: {"snapshot":{"businessName":"Test Med Spa","industry":"Health/Wellness (Med Spa)","currentRevenue":"$20K-$50K/month","primaryFrustration":"Not enough leads coming in","goal":"Increase qualified leads and bookings through Instagram","platformFocus":"Instagram"},"benchmarks":{"engagementRateTarget":"3-5% (posts), 5-10% (stories)","followerGrowthTarget":"50-100 new relevant followers/month","leadConversionRateTarget":"2-5% (from Instagram inquiries to booked consultations)","websiteClickThroughRateTarget":"1-3% (from Instagram bio/stories)","storyViewToDMConversionTarget":"5-10%"},"weeklyPlan":[{"week":1,"theme":"Foundation & Optimization","activities":["Optimize Instagram Bio: Clear value proposition, call-to-action (e.g., 'Book a Free Consult'), link to booking page.","Update Highlight Reels: Create/organize highlights for 'Services', 'Before/After', 'FAQs', 'Testimonials', 'Meet the Team'.","Content Audit: Review top-performing posts, identify content gaps.","Competitor Analysis: Identify 3-5 successful local med spas on Instagram, analyze their content strategy, engagement, and CTAs.","Set up Instagram Shopping/Product Tags (if applicable for retail products)."],"contentIdeas":["Behind-the-scenes of the spa","Meet the team introductions","Quick tips for skin health (e.g., '3 Myths About Botox')","Before/After sneak peeks (with consent)"]},{"week":2,"theme":"Content Strategy & Engagement","activities":["Develop a 30-day content calendar focusing on education, inspiration, and promotion (80/20 rule).","Implement 3-5 Reels/week: Educational, trend-based, before/after, quick tips.","Daily Stories: Polls, Q&A, 'This or That', behind-the-scenes, service spotlights.","Engage with followers: Respond to all DMs and comments within 24 hours.","Identify 5-10 local businesses/influencers for potential collaborations."],"contentIdeas":["Reel: 'A Day in the Life of a Med Spa Aesthetician'","Story: 'Poll: What's your biggest skin concern?'","Post: 'Benefits of [Specific Service]'","Carousel: '5 Steps to Glowing Skin'"]},{"week":3,"theme":"Lead Generation & Conversion","activities":["Run 1-2 targeted Instagram Ads for lead generation (e.g., 'Free Consultation' or 'First-Time Client Discount').","Implement a clear Call-to-Action (CTA) in every post/story leading to booking or inquiry.","Host an Instagram Live Q&A session about a popular service (e.g., 'All About Fillers').","Create a lead magnet (e.g., 'Guide to Anti-Aging') promoted via bio link and stories.","Direct Message (DM) outreach to engaged followers who ask questions or show interest."],"contentIdeas":["Reel: 'Client Testimonial Spotlight'","Story: 'Swipe Up to Book Your Free Consult!'","Post: 'Limited Time Offer: 20% Off Your First Hydrafacial'","Live: 'Ask the Expert: Your Botox Questions Answered'"]},{"week":4,"theme":"Analysis & Refinement","activities":["Review Instagram Insights: Analyze reach, engagement, follower growth, and top-performing content.","Track lead sources: Ask new clients 'How did you hear about us?' specifically noting Instagram.","A/B test different CTAs in posts/stories.","Refine content strategy based on performance data.","Plan for future collaborations or community engagement events."],"contentIdeas":["Reel: 'Before & After Transformation Compilation'","Story: 'Behind the Scenes: New Product Arrival!'","Post: 'Client Spotlight: [Client Name]'s Journey'","Carousel: 'FAQs About Our Services'"]}],"successMetrics":{"primaryMetrics":["Number of new leads generated from Instagram (DM inquiries, form submissions via link in bio)","Number of booked consultations/services directly attributed to Instagram","Website click-through rate from Instagram bio/stories"],"secondaryMetrics":["Instagram follower growth rate","Average engagement rate per post/Reel","Story view completion rate","Number of DMs received"]},"warnings":["Consistency is key: Irregular posting or engagement will yield poor results.","Authenticity over perfection: People connect with real stories and genuine interactions.","Avoid overselling: Focus on educating and building trust, then gently guide to conversion.","Monitor ad spend closely: Ensure positive ROI for paid campaigns.","Be mindful of medical advertising regulations and client privacy (HIPAA)."],"milestone":{"30DayGoal":"Increase Instagram-sourced inquiries by 20% and achieve a 10% increase in follower growth.","90DayGoal":"Consistently generate 5-10 qualified leads per week from Instagram, resulting in 2-3 new booked services weekly, and establish Instagram as a primary lead generation channel."}}
